Usage imbued on the face

A fetching beauty spot under an eye or a smile as warm as the sun distracts foes and captures hearts alike.

Immanence (mental, visual) Your beauty becomes supernaturally enhanced, distracting foes and imposing a –1 circumstance penalty to melee attack rolls against you.

Transcendence—Captivating Charm 1 (concentrate, emotion, mental, transcendence, visual) You focus your attention on a creature within 30 feet, overwhelming its senses. The creature must succeed at a @Check[will|against:class] save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated] by you until the start of your next turn. The condition ends if you use a hostile action against the target, but not if you use a hostile action against its allies.
